div.head: Description of changes for 2012.12
div.p: This is the first public version of the text. It is a first draft started from a copy of a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. Additions and corrections await the completion of a transcription of the Sorbonne text and a collation comparison of available manuscript witnesses. Difficult transcription spots have been tagged as 'unclear' and most name elements have been given a reference attribute. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still await construction.
